summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2015 FORD FUSION.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE DRIVING AT HIGH SPEEDS, THERE WAS AN ABNORMAL SOUND COMING FROM THE FUEL TANK. WHILE THE VEHICLE WAS STOPPED, THE VEHICLE STALLED. THE CONTACT WAS ABLE TO RESTART THE VEHICLE AFTER SEVERAL ATTEMPTS HOWEVER, THE CHECK ENGINE WARNING LIGHT WAS ILLUMINATED. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO ED BUTTS FORD (1515 N HACIENDA BLVD, LA PUENTE, CA 91744, (800) 960-3673) BUT WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED.  THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT CONTACTED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS UNKNOWN.
